articles.title: Ex-Michigan Wolverine wins race at Tour de France - MLive.com
articles.description: Michael Woods, a former track and cross country athlete at Michigan, won Stage 9 of the Tour de France on Sunday.
articles.content:
Former Michigan Wolverine Michael Woods pulled off a major upset during one of the most mountainous stages of the 2023 Tour de France.
The Ottawa, Ontario native completed Stage 9 of the event at Pu… [+1370 chars]
